AddClassClassNameTooltip: 在此输入你新课堂的名称
AddClassClassCodeTooltip: 当你建立课堂时，Smartix会产生一个课室号码，分享此课室号码以让学生或家长加入你的课堂。如果需要，你也可以修改此号码。
AddClassChooseIconTooltip: 你可以选择一个符合课堂主题的图案。
addClassDescription: 如果学生小于13岁，需要告知家长电邮，确保家长得到消息通知，是否有问题.
App_tour_explain: 软件 游历: 软件的好处!
HowToAddMemberToYourGroup: 如何在你的群组增加成员
AskParentAndStudentToDownloadApp: 邀请家长和学生下载手机软件“Smartix” on the App Store or on Google Play
AskParentAndStudentToDownloadApp_IOS: 邀请家长和学生下载手机软件 “Smartix”
AnyoneInThisClassCanStartAChat: 课室的任何成员都可以展开对话
CantJoinTheClassYouOwn: 不能再次加入自己创建的课室.
ClassCodeErrorMessage: 课室号码仅接受小写字母（a-z）或者数字（0-9）例如. math123. 课室名称可随意设定.
EmailPostEmbed: 电邮, 张贴或其他方法
EmailSentCheckMailBox: 郵件已經發出，請檢查你的郵箱。
EnjoyTheApp: 前往 Smartix 与学生和家长进行更多的交流!
feedbackTextarea: 告诉我们你的意见! 你的反馈将有助我们继续提升服务以及用家的满意度
HelpReply: 你可以选择用户回复方式. 你可选择用户回复评论、投票或两者兼用
How_would_you_like_to_add_new_members: 你想如何添加新的成员
How_would_you_like_to_receive_notificati: 你想如何接收消息通知?
InviteTeacherToLearnHowToAdd: 你现已创建你的第一个课室. 学习如何邀请学生和家长加入你的课室.
Itisworkofftime: 你的老师现时不在，请稍后再试.
IWillOnlyMessagePeople13AndOlder: 我只会与13岁或以上的用家进行对话
JoinAClassByInputClassCode: 请输入想加入的课室号码
JoinedFirstClass: 恭喜! 你现已加入你的第一个课室.
No_private_note_yet: 你可在此书写个人笔记. 例如,你可以写下家长的名字或者其他有用的信息
PasswordChanged: 你的密码已更新，欢迎回来
PasswordNotTheSame: 新密码及新密码确认不一致
PressCtrlCorLongPressToCopy: 长按链接 以复制或 按 Crtl•C 以复制
Report_subtitle: 确保 Smartix 的用家安全是我们的首要任务, 但同时这是一个共同的责任
ResetPasswordEmailContent: __first_name__, 如果你忘记了登入密码，请按以下链接以重设密码:
SendEmailInvitationsForStudentAndParentJ: 发送电邮邀请是一个最好的方法让学生和家长加入你的课室.
ShareThisLinkHelpsStudentsAndParentJoinY: 学生和家长将可以加入你的课室
ShowClass: 展示如何进入你的课室
SignOutFailure: 你未能成功登出. 请重新尝试.
StudentAndParentCanJoinByClassCode: 学生和家长可通过输入课室号码加入你的课室.
StudentAndParentVisitLinkToJoinClass: 学生和家长可通过复制和粘贴，访问此链接加入你的课室.
Thanks_for_sharing: 十分感谢你反馈，有助继续提升我们的服务
ThisCommentIsHiddenFromJoinedMembers: 此留言已被隐藏，其他人无法看见。
Type_Class_Code: 与你的课室成员共享课室号码 (可修改)
UnsubscribeEmailNotification: 如果你不希望接受电邮通知, 前往 主页: 你 > 通知 > 关闭电邮
VerifyEmailSubject: 欢迎使用Smartix - 请验证你的电邮
WeHaveAppVersion: 我们有更方便的手机版.你可在此下载
your_class_is_ready_classname: 你的课室 __ 课室名称__ 已准备好!
OfficeHoursExplanation: 你可设定和管理方便联络的工作时间
requiredFields: 请确认已填上所需信息

applicationError.refreshRequired: 程式出现错误. 请刷新并重新尝试.

import.incorrectImportFormat: 此档案不符合所需格式. 请检查并重新尝试.

add.studentDobRequired: 学生需要填写出生日期

absence.NoChildren: 现时没有子女在此学校
absence.Localtime: 表格需填学校的当地时间
absence.Notification: 如果你的子女沒有回校，学校会发送消息及询问详情.
absence.ApplyForleave: 你也可以提交请假申请

Admin.AbsenceRequestMadeNotApproved: Excuse message received by parent but not yet acknowledged by the school
Admin.AbsentLateNoNotice: Absent/late not excused yet by parents
Admin.Allfieldsbelongtoaparentrecord: All fields after Student E-mail belong to a parent record.
Admin.AddnewRSSfeedsandlinkittoyournewsgroup: You may add new RSS feeds and link it to your newsgroup.
Admin.addnewclassesbyfillingintheformbelow: You may add new classes to your school by filling in the form below.
Admin.addnewnewsgroupbyfillingintheformbelow: You may add new newsgroup to your school by filling in the form below.
Admin.Anycombinationofletters: Any combination of letters and numbers unique to each student.
Admin.clickonAccounttoImportstudents: To get started, click on Account > Import students
Admin.Createaspreadsheetlisting: Create a spreadsheet listing students and parents in the format shown above.
Admin.createdauserrecordforthefollowingparents: We have created a user record for the following parents. But because they did not provide an email, please notify them manually of their usernames and passwords.
Admin.CreateSpreadsheet: Create a spreadsheet listing students in the format shown above. Download our CSV template, and complete the columns. It is essential that the format match the template and that no mandatory columns are left out. Refer to the following guidelines for entering your student data into the spreadsheet:
Admin.Displayentriesfrom: Display entries from, and including, this date
Admin.Displayentriesto: Display entries to, and including, this date
Admin.Distributionlistsareuseful: Distribution lists are useful to send information to a same group of people. They can be used in classes and/or news.
Admin.Downloadparents'CSVtemplatetogetstarted: Download parents' CSV template to get started.
Admin.DownloadourCSVtemplatetogetstarted: Download our CSV template to get started.
Admin.Downloadteachers'CSVtemplatetogetstarted: Download teachers' CSV template to get started.
Admin.Excusemessage: Excuse message received by parent but not yet acknowledged by the school.
Admin.Forexample: For example,  you have defined classes per grade. You can then reuse these lists and send to several classes at the same time instead of listing all members again.
Admin.fileHeader: file with the first row being the headings.
Admin.fileHeaderEncode: file with the first row being the headings. Please also ensure that the file is encoded in UTF-8.
Admin.Step1: Step 1 - Download our CSV template, and complete the columns
Admin.Step2: Step 2: Save your spreadsheet as a CSV file.
Admin.Step3: Step 3: Upload your CSV file of parents
Admin.subscribeexistingnewsgroupsanduser: You can see existing newsgroups and users being subscribed to the newsgroups in here
Admin.SimplyfillinfieldsandclickAddNews: Simply fill in fields and click Add News.
Admin.Selectthedistributionlist(s)tocopyusersf: Select the distribution list(s) to copy users from. For multiple selection, press Ctrl(PC) or ⌘(Mac)
Admin.setapasswordfortheuser: You may manually set a password for the user.
Admin.StudentIDcanbeskipped: Student ID can be skipped if Student E-mail is present, and vice versa. At least one parent or carer is mandatory.
Admin.Title: Title
Admin.Tabledisplay: This table displays the student marked as late or absent by the system. It reconciles the absences with parents' notice. Please acknowledge these messages as soon as possible.
Admin.TheexampleshownisfromMicrosoftExcel: The example shown is from Microsoft Excel. If you are using another program, the process may differ slightly.
Admin.Thestructureofthefile: The structure of the file is basically 1 line per teacher. The columns describes how the teacher's class(es) will be organized.Please refer to the following guidelines for entering teacher data into the spreadsheet:
Admin.RequiredfieldforallGrade6students: Required field for all Grade 6 students since the email address is also the ID used to login. If students don't have email addresses, fake email addresses can be used to allow the students access to the system.
Admin.ClassroomExplanation: Required fields for all students. E.g. Grade 4B, the classes in Grade 4A and B. Can be identical to grade.
Admin.RequiredPleaseinputinDD-MM-YYYYformat: Required. Please input in DD-MM-YYYY format like any other date.
Admin.Requiredatleastone: Required, at least one. You can list up to 7 subjects taught.
Admin.Requiredatleastoneclassroom: Required at least one. You can list up to 10 classrooms by teacher e.g. Grade 4B, the second classroom from Grade 4. Can be identical to grade.
Admin.notexcused: Absent/late not excused yet by parents.
Admin.Note:AllotherfieldsareoptionalincludingP: Note: All other fields are optional including Password, which allows you to pre-set a student's password. Required fields are highlighted in
Admin.linkaRSSfeedtoanewsgroup: You may link a RSS feed to a newsgroup so all new entries to the feed will be sent to the newsgroup.
Admin.manageallschoolcommunication: With this dashboard, you can manage all school communication
Admin.Messagesent: These are the messages for which the parent/guardian of the student(s) have sent as notice that the student will be late/absent. Please acknowledge these messages as soon as possible.
Admin.makeanoteofthelogindetails: Please make a note of the login details now, they will not be shown again.
Admin.markedwitha*inthetemplate: or marked with a * in the template.We advise you to transpose the spreadsheet to help filling it. Download our CSV template to get started.
Admin.PleaseImport: Please import the user data as a
Admin.Optionalclassname: Optional. classname e.g English G4B. You can list up to 10 classnames by teacher (a teacher can have several classes)
Admin.OptionalMarkXParents: Optional. Mark by "X" if you want the parents to join this class (e.g the parent of class Grade 4B). Up to 10 classes. Tip: invite parents for primary classes
Admin.OptionalMarkXStudents: Optional. Mark by "X" if you want the students to join this class (e.g the parent of class Grade 4B). Up to 10 classes.In this case, the class name in this file need to match the class name in the student file upload (Grade 4B). Tip: invite students for secondary classes
Admin.OnceyourCSVfilehasbeenuploaded: Once your CSV file has been uploaded, you will be able to confirm the parent information before importing.
Admin.Gradelevels: Grade levels. Required fields for all students.

Newsgroups.Displaynewsgroup: 可显示学校的所有消息群组, 你可通过打勾选择退出消息群组, 退出消息群组后, 你将不会收到消息群组的消息. 部分消息群组不允许退出. 退出后，消息群组仍然显示, 你可再次选择加入与否.

schools.Schoolshortname: 学校名称简称,出现在链接上:
schools.Schooladminusername: 学校管理者名称, 如果此项空白, 学校简称将成为管理人名称:
schools.Shortname: 学校名称简称 (仅限一个字, 将会出现在URL):
schools.Schooladministratoremail: 学校管理者电邮地址 (此登入在Smartix的学校配置上具备权限)

smartix-chat.Check/UncheckAll: 选中 / 取消选中 全部

smartix-sharer.SignupWithEmail: 使用当前用户及电邮在此注册？
